hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
EXIST_VERS=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsi/webapps/safi-smsi-server*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` print dai-smsi-${EXIST_VERS} > /var/www/html/scrum1/smsi.txt print dai-smsi-${EXIST_VERS} > /var/www/html/scrum1/smsi_db.txt
